alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 313 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Keller, or 7 miles southwest of Coffee Bluff, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Richmond Hill, Coffee Bluff, Hunter Army Airfield, Fort Mcallister and Belfast. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
